remarks: Minus 1 times a vector is the underlying group's inverse element. Equation 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 51.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvinv.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvinv.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvinv.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvinv.5 $e |- M = ( inv ` G ) $.
nvinv $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) = ( M ` A ) ) $.
